Appearance

Welcome to the Verilog Guide

This course covers the following topics :

Introduction To Verilog

Learn the Basics of Verilog HDL and implement various circuits using Verilog.

Finite State Machines

Design a Verilog-based FSM that enhances your circuits with efficient sequential control and decision-making capabilities.

MIPS Single Cycle Processor

Build an exciting MIPS single cycle processor which will allow you to run MIPS hardware commands.
